Who are we?
Al Rafay Consulting, LLC is a global company with expertise in consulting and the development of innovative solutions through Microsoft products. Spend a significant portion of the day writing high-quality Python code for various projects, adhering to best practices and coding standards.

Document code, APIs, and technical processes to ensure clarity and maintainability of the codebase. Write technical documentation, including design documents, user guides, and API documentation, to facilitate knowledge sharing and onboarding of new team members.

What is it like to work in ARC?
You'd work alongside a team of smart, passionate, and experienced people working on challenging problems. Our team consists of diverse set of skills and technical expertise. Most importantly, we're supportive of one another; we work as a team to enable each other to launch best projects and products.
Best work can mean a lot of things. We care about testing, and apply that through a mix of unit, integration, and acceptance tests. That diligence allows us to ship early and often through an automated continuous integration and delivery process.
We give our team members the time and space to learn and apply these and other tools correctly. We share our knowledge with each other on a regular basis through pairing, PR reviews, and team talks.
What are we looking for in a candidate?
You have a well-founded expertise in Python.
We won't limit to ‘x’ years’ experience, what we're looking for an individuals who can demonstrate exceptional Python development skills, a profound understanding of best practices in software design, and a mastery of core programming concepts. We're excited to introduce you to our tech stack as long as you bring a solid foundation in Python development to the table.
You know how to build things from start to finish. You can identify a need, understand its impact, and seek out and work with others to deliver a well-crafted solution in a team environment—asking for help when needed.
You have good communication skills. As a distributed team, it’s important that we're able to understand each other, verbally and in writing, connecting at the appropriate level of abstraction. You communicate clearly and with empathy, whether you’re discussing refactoring options with team members and stakeholders.
You are eager to collaborate, learn and teach. Our Engineering team is friendly and supportive of each other, and we look for opportunities to learn from each other’s experience.
Technical Skills
Extensive experience in Python development, with a deep understanding of the language's syntax, libraries, and ecosystem. You should be able to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
Strong knowledge of web frameworks such as Django or Flask for building robust web applications in Python. Experience in developing RESTful APIs and integrating them with frontend technologies.
Proficiency in working with relational databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQLite, as well as NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Redis. You should be comfortable with designing database schemas, writing complex queries, and optimizing database performance.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git for managing code repositories, branching, merging, and collaboration with team members.
Experience in writing unit tests and integration tests using frameworks like pytest or unittest. Proficiency in debugging and troubleshooting issues in Python applications using debugging tools and techniques.
Knowledge of deployment tools like Docker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes for containerizing and deploying Python applications. Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and automation tools like Jenkins or GitLab CI for continuous integration and deployment.
Awareness of security best practices for web development, including securing APIs, handling authentication and authorization, and protecting against common security vulnerabilities like SQL injection and cross-site scripting (XSS).
Experience in data processing and analysis using libraries like NumPy, pandas, or scikit-learn for scientific computing, data manipulation, and machine learning tasks.
Strong documentation skills to create clear and comprehensive technical documentation, including code comments, README files, and API documentation. Effective communication skills to collaborate with team members, stakeholders, and clients.
Excellent problem-solving abilities to tackle complex technical challenges and troubleshoot issues in Python applications. A proactive approach to identifying potential issues and proposing innovative solutions.
Qualifications
3+ years of hands-on experience in Python development, with a proven track record of building robust and scalable applications.
While not mandatory, certifications such as Python Institute PCAP (Python Certified Associate Programmer) or PCEP (Python Certified Entry-Level Programmer) can demonstrate your proficiency in Python programming.
A bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field is preferred, although equivalent experience or certifications can also be considered.
Familiarity with project management methodologies like Agile or Scrum, as well as tools such as Jira or Trello, can be advantageous for effective collaboration and project planning within development teams.
Demonstrated commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest developments in Python programming and related technologies.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to tackle complex technical challenges and troubleshoot issues in Python applications effectively.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams, articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, and contribute to a positive team environment.

We offer everything you'd expect from a successful service company, with the stability of a company that's been going strong for over 10 years.
International Exposure – get to work with global clients to gain modern world experience
Competitive number of paid vacations – get an adequate pool of paid vacations to get some time off from daily work routine
Family-friendly. Flexible schedules along with supportive parental leave policies.
Trainings & Microsoft Certifications – based on your skills set you will be offered to get Microsoft certifications & trainings to enhance your technical skills
Healthy-friendly culture. You'll join a completely distributed engineering team and will benefit from the first-class remote experience we've created—giving you the flexibility to work where you want, with all the tools and resources you need to succeed.
The best tools and technology money can buy. Top of the line hardware, software, and whatever else you need to be awesome.

About Tajir
Our mission is to make the retail economy of Pakistan radically more efficient.
Stores in Pakistan have been buying products in the same way for nearly a century. Why should 20 trucks deliver to the same store in a single day? Why do salespeople waste fuel to collect orders on scraps of paper? Why do store owners wait restlessly for someone to visit once a week to collect an order?
Tajir is a radical break from the past. We offer an app where stores can buy everything they need, delivered reliably the next day. We drastically reduce the number of vehicles on the road with efficient, centralized delivery, so both store owners and manufacturers enjoy higher profits. With $150B of purchases made by retailers annually, even modest efficiency gains have an outsized economic impact.
We are backed by Kleiner Perkins (early investors in Google, Amazon) and Y Combinator (early investors in Coinbase, Airbnb, Dropbox). Learn more about us on Forbes and Geo News.

You are humble. You treat others with the same kindness, patience, and respect, regardless of seniority, class, or gender.
You have an extreme attention to detail. No imperfection escapes your discerning eyes.
